fact: Here is a test fact, on the morning of 11/9

As we prepare to stake on mainnet, expect that the final versions of beacon chain software (all clients) likely won't be ready until after Nov. 24.
In meantime, sync geth, secure your system, but wait to install the client. 

-- @superphiz

Wonder why the deposit contract balance isn't necessarily divisble by 32?
Deposits do not need to equal 32 exactly. Validators may deposit less (e.g. 1 ETH ) to reserve a validator index, or top-off existing validators which have been penalized.

With a total of 13,888 ETH, the top depositer to the deposit contract is 0xbb84d966c09264ce9a2104a4a20bb378369986db.
Check out @DuneAnalytics dashboard for more desposit contract stats. https://www.duneanalytics.com/hagaetc/eth2-0-deposits

Staking on Ethereum 2.0 delivers a nice reward rate. But be aware that the interest is *not* compounding. It is earned against a maximum effective balance of 32.
More: https://www.attestant.io/posts/understanding-validator-effective-balance/

Be careful! It's possible to generate an Eth2 deposit that is accepted by the deposit contract but rejected by the beacon chain. This means total deposit loss! ðŸ˜± 

@paulhauner's thread here: https://twitter.com/paulhauner/status/1324211564145094657

If you don't have 32 ETH, don't worry. Check out @Rocket_Pool which offers a decentralized staking for users who have > 0.1 ETH.

Those who choose to be a Rocket Pool node operator earn commisions on top of their staking rewards ðŸ¤‘.

To trigger genesis, there must be at least 16384 32-ETH validator deposits.

This is an important distinction from the 524,288 ETH threshold (16,384 * 32) that is commonly discussed. It is possible to have more than 524,288 ETH in the deposit contract and genesis still not triggered.

To trigger genesis, there must 16384 validator deposits of 32 ETH.

This is a distinction from the commonly asserted 524,288 ETH (16,384 * 32) threshold. It's technically possible to have > 524,288 ETH deposited and still meet genesis conditions.

As we prepare to stake on mainnet, expect that the final versions of beacon chain software (all clients) likely won't be ready until after Nov. 24.
In meantime, sync geth, secure your system, but wait to install the client. 

-- @superphiz
